# GKLeaderboard.LeaderboardType.recurring

**Case**

A leaderboard that recurs, allowing players a fresh start to compete and earn higher ranks in each ocurrence.

## Declaration

```swift
case recurring
```

## Constants

- **GKLeaderboard.LeaderboardType.classic**: A leaderboard that never expires, showing all-time rankings of all players.

items.description: A leaderboard that never expires, showing all-time rankings of all players.
items.name: GKLeaderboard.LeaderboardType.classic

title: GKLeaderboard.LeaderboardType.recurring
